description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies at UCO. Eligibility Requirements Majoring in any field related to College of Education & Professional Studies Demonstrates extraordinary leadership skills Demonstrates financial need Must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming academic year Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
